Hi Angela!
welcome to the group! :)
I know what you mean about having kids =
running your whole life and no time for spook hunting... but what i do is p=
ut mine to bed and then off i go talking to spooks... i get PLENTY of activ=
ity in my home, so i dont think you need to go anyplace special to record e=
vps.... i used to go to cemetaries but i found i get just as many ( if not =
more) at home than i do there, plus the ppl at my house tend to know me, an=
d then ones in the boneyards dont...
good luck, and cant wait to hear some =
files!
:)
Charm

Now all I have to do =
is find a period of time that's quiet and 
private (hard to do with two boy=
s ages 8 and 5 home from school all 
day) I'm looking forward to trying it =
out. I will post back with 
progress and results. 

Thanks!
